headline: Telling Their Stories: Black Women in Film
abstract: With over 60 movies and special events, this series tells the history of how they told their stories, both overtly and subversively.
lead_paragraph: Film Forum’s latest series, “Black Women: Trailblazing African American Performers & Images, 1920-2001,” opening Friday, is an event. Not just something to mark on your calendar, but an event to line up for. Among the women featured here are Josephine Baker, Evelyn Preer, Pam Grier, Diahann Carroll and Janet Jackson.
